meanings.definition: Formed by the collection of units or particles into a mass or whole.
meanings.sent1: The playground had colorful aggregates of toys scattered around.
meanings.sent2: The artist used aggregates colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations were an interesting mix of aggregates balloons and streamers.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was an aggregate of different fabrics, creating a unique look.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a vibrant aggregate of flowers and plants.

meanings.definition: To collect or gather into a mass or whole.
meanings.sent1: She aggregates all her toys in one corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The farmer aggregates the harvested crops for storage.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to aggregate their ideas for the group project.
meanings.sent4: He aggregates his thoughts before making an important decision.
meanings.sent5: The team will aggregate the data to present at the meeting.
